Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of visa officer's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's credibility doubted due to inconsistencies in employment references and admissions of lying about U.S. visits
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Employment references, applicant statements, travel history
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation regarding work experience and travel history
Crimes.Application_Error: Providing conflicting evidence on work experience and false statements about U.S. visits
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the visa officer erred in refusing the application based on credibility
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility doubts due to inconsistent statements and documentation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Conflicting employment evidence and admissions of prior falsehoods
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubts about truthfulness of work experience and travel disclosures
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant claimed misunderstandings but failed to resolve inconsistencies
